Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
The application entry point.

Parameters:
args - Command line arguments (not used)

setCopyEnabled

protected void setCopyEnabled(boolean enable)
Enables and disables the copy/cut actions in the editor.

Parameters:
enable - true if text is selected and copy/cut should be enabled.

isCopyEnabled

protected boolean isCopyEnabled()
Returns true if Copy is enabled (if text is highlighted).

Returns:
true if the copy action is enabled.

getFileChooser

protected JFileChooser getFileChooser()

setFileFilter

protected void setFileFilter(String fileExt)
Sets the file chooser's filter to filter the selected file extension.

Parameters:
fileExt - the String file extension. If the filter is not one of .htm, .java, .css, .hud, then the filter is set to all files.

updateStatus

protected void updateStatus(String msg)
Updates the status bar.

Parameters:
msg - The String messages to display.
